fr.univ.lille1.handler.impl

Class CommandHandlerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.univ.lille1.handler.impl.CommandHandlerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandHandler

    public class CommandHandlerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CommandHandler
    CommandHandlerImpl contains the reference of the input/output stream to receive/send messages from/to the client.
    Author:
    Durigneux Antoine, Scouflaire Emmanuel
